rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('will use the money to partner') without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports how money will be used without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes specific actions organizations will take (training, testing, treatment, PPE), without active reassurance.
